subject: Firearms
Plea Bargaining
Stadiums and Arenas
Threats and Threatening Messages
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In a plea agreement announced Monday, Javaris Crittenton admitted to carrying an unloaded handgun into the Wizards’ locker room and will serve a year of probation.
snippet: In a plea agreement announced Monday, Javaris Crittenton admitted to carrying an unloaded handgun into the Wizards’ locker room and will serve a year of probation.
